channel.title: Need a Hoster
channel.description:
I need a hoster that meets the followings requirements:
1. Can host 20/7 +
2. Is online around +5GMT - +11GMT (Other times can be worked out)
3. Will not mess around with the server at all
4. Know how to host no-ip
5. Can follow instructions easily
6. Has atleast 1GB - 2GB RAM
7. Being able to code basically is a plus for when i am MIA
NOTE: The hoster will be hosting one of three worlds.
Obviously the hoster will get equal rights with me anything else needed should be able to be provided, e.g. A Runescape account can be provided.
We have about 10,000 registered accounts in - game and had 500 active forums members before it was reset.
Please add me on my MSN and / or post here ..... alive_arent_i@hotmail.com
